Bio.Name: Lakshya Narula
Bio.Designation: IIT(BHU) Gold| Economics Masters @ Ashoka University | Learning to make sense out of data | #learnwithlakshya
Bio.About: Lakshya Narula is a student whose sole aim in life is to keep learning and then sharing the knowledge with others.He got trapped into the knowledge paradox few years ago and after 2 years of rehabilitation on LinkedIn, he's fine and tries to learn from everyone.In his normal life, he's completing his Graduate Studies in Economics at Ashoka University where he seems to be intelligent but is just above average.His past includes two degrees and a gold medal from IIT(BHU), Varanasi.He has found his passion in learning economics and reading books, which he tried to pursue each and every day of his life.

My profile link is - http://globalmillennial.org/author/lakshyanarula/

Few of the speakers included Vitalik Buterin (Founder of Ethereum), Charles Tsai (Former Producer, CNN) etc.- Took part in a debate competition held on the subject "Is online media necessary"- Presented an Action Project combining the Blockchain technology and Internet of Things (IoT) and tried to solve the Renewable Energy Crisis.

HUII, or the Harvard College US-India Initiative, is a student-run organization that aims to create a dialogue between Indian and American youth to address some of Indias most pressing social, economic, and environmental issues today.Started in 2011, the founders set out with the goal of fostering long-term cooperation between the United States and India and leveraging these relationships to address some of Indias most pressing social and economic issues.We aim to: Create a dialogue between students and exchange on issues related to India Help foster long-term relationships with young leaders around the globe Provide resources for social entrepreneurship in India

Naxap's foundation was laid in order to provide technology solutions to the world. Our first product is Bytesloader.Bytesloader is an online downloading tool made by college students who were in need of a one stop solution to all downloading problems. You can download all videos, playlists from website database of over 1000 including vimeo, youtube, 9gag, facebook, 22tracks, Soundcloud etc.- Creating a presence on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/bytesloader) by creating, posting and distributing the content.- Managing marketing team and assigning various tasks for timely delivery of the work.- Writing and editing blog posts.

Recommendation.Name: Nikhil Jain (  )
Recommendation.Headline: Guiding Aspirants for dream MS/ MiM/ MBA/ PhD admissions abroad  | CMO at ForeignAdmits.com |  LinkedIn Trainer
Recommendation.Description:
Lakshya is an ebullient person with never ending energy towards work spirits. His contribution since the start of the Start-up was good and handy. Being an active learner and a sincere person, he has increased the social media interaction and has helped as main publicity coordinator to reach 3000+ likes in a very short span of time and has created buzz in the editing industry. He was not only a polite listener but also a vital contributor in most of our meetings and plans.

I wish him all the success in his future endeavours.
